description.value:
Carved of driftwood stained white with the salt of the sea, a pirate staff has jewels and gold pieces embedded in the wood. A skull and crossbones sit on top. When used as a weapon, the staff is a +2 striking fearsome staff. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Coerce].

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gale Blast], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Know the Way]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Seashell of Stolen Sound]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mist], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Water Breathing], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Water Walk]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mind of Menace], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Water Breathing]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Solid Fog], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Water Walk]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Flowing Strike], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mariner's Curse]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
